products.title: 9m Extension Cord Reel – Red
products.description:
Product Overview: 9m Extension Lead Reel

9m Extension Lead Reel in Red delivers safe, tidy power where you need it. The 9m (30 ft) reach suits compact workshops, garages, and busy work areas without excess slack or trip risks.

9m Extension Lead Reel Features

Mount to a wall, floor, or ceiling for instant access. Ceiling mounting keeps floors clear and helps reduce hazards in high-traffic spaces. The retract system guides the cord as it rewinds to limit tangles and snags.

Design and Build

The durable housing protects the cable and mechanism. A smooth, controlled rewind helps prevent whip-back. Components are engineered for daily use in demanding environments.

Sizes, Colours, and Options

Choose 9 m or 15 m lengths in Yellow, Red, Black, or White. Pick a colour that stands out for visibility or blends with your workspace. Each option shares the same robust build and easy handling.

Fast Setup

Mark the fixing points, secure the bracket, hang the reel, and connect power. Most installs take minutes with basic tools. Ceiling mounting is popular in workshops to keep floors clear.

Use Cases

Power hand tools, chargers, and test gear. Ideal for benches, bays, and mobile workstations. Retract after use to keep the area neat and reduce wear on the cable.

What’s Included

Reel unit, mounting bracket, fixings, and quick-start guide. Add a compatible plug or outlet as required by your site standard.

Explore More

See the matching 30 ft Red Retractable Extension Cord Reel or browse our Cord & Cable Reels for more options.

  • ✅ Wall, floor, or ceiling mounting options
  • ✅ Smooth retract helps prevent tangles and damage
  • ✅ Durable housing for daily workshop use

products.description: Steel Wall Mounted Ret retractable Belt Barrier - Magnetic WallMaster 400 - 3.9m/4.6m Belt The WallMaster Magnetic Ret retractable Wall Barrier is an ideal choice for temporary mounting on metallic surfaces. The choice of a 3.9m or 4.6m belt provides a versatile solution for blocking corridors and doorways, maximizing its effectiveness. WallMaster is committed to offering affordable, high-quality wall-mounted barriers for access control. The Steel WallMaster 400 is available in five standard finishes, adding a touch of style to your space. The retractable belt is equipped with a slow-retract brake system, guaranteeing a controlled and safe retraction. The belt ends are lockable, adding extra security and peace of mind. Choose from 50 diverse color and safety message options to customize the belt, reflecting your brand identity or safety guidelines. If you require specific visuals, you can fully customize the belt with printed colors or messages, tailoring it to your exact needs. The WallMaster range provides versatile mounting solutions, catering to both permanent and temporary installations. With an array of mounting options available, you can find the perfect solution to suit your space and requirements.

products.title: Rope Barrier 10 Pack - Polished Brass Rope Posts-1.8m Rope & Sign Frame
products.description:
– Set of 10 Brass Rope Barriers

The RopeMaster Set of 10 Brass Rope Barriers combines timeless style with everyday practicality. This complete 10-post, 8-rope set also includes an elegant A4 sign topper with clear acrylic sheets. Therefore, it’s ideal for creating stylish queue areas, VIP sections, or welcoming event entrances. Each post features a polished, professional finish that enhances any venue, from hotels and theatres to exhibitions and showrooms.

Elegant Design and Durable Construction

Each post in this rope post barrier set delivers strength and stability. Because it’s made from high-grade steel, it stays firm even in busy environments. In addition, the full-circumference floor protector stops scratches and scuffs, keeping your floors looking new. You can also choose from two timeless top styles—crown or flat—to match your décor and brand image.

Complete Set for Professional Presentation

This ten-post configuration with four ropes includes everything you need for a coordinated, polished setup. Furthermore, the included A4 sign topper holds posters or notices between two 1.6 mm acrylic sheets, keeping your message clean, flat, and visible. Because the sign mount connects directly to compatible posts, it maintains a smooth, seamless appearance without extra fittings.

Indoor and Outdoor Flexibility

The RopeMaster barrier set performs beautifully indoors and also suits short-term outdoor use. Consequently, it’s a versatile choice for hospitality venues, exhibitions, retail spaces, and corporate events. Moreover, quick-link rope ends allow rapid setup and removal, while weighted bases keep each post secure. However, if you need long-term outdoor use, upgrade to our Elegance Range for maximum weather protection.

Why Choose RopeMaster 10 Brass Rope Barriers set?
  • ✅ Complete set – ten posts, eight ropes, and an A4 sign topper
  • ✅ Elegant design with durable metal construction
  • ✅ Floor protectors prevent surface damage
  • ✅ Simple setup and professional presentation
  • ✅ Any combination of posts and ropes available-just get in touch

Overall, the Rope Post Barrier Set delivers a perfect balance of style, quality, and affordability. As a result, it offers an easy and attractive way to manage queues and enhance presentation areas throughout your venue.

Want to see the full range of traditional post and rope barriers? Explore more here.

products.title: QueueMaster Belt Barrier and 2 Collars - Bundle Offer - Black
products.description:
Barricade Post And Collar Bundle –

The Barricade Post And Collar Bundle in black steel offers a complete and flexible way to support long runs of panels. Designed for fast setup, it includes a retractable belt barrier and collar set that integrate perfectly with our panel systems. Whether extending an existing layout or creating a new queue zone, this bundle keeps every section secure and professional.

Fast Assembly and Reliable Performance

Each barricade stand kit bundle connects quickly without tools. Simply attach the supplied collars to the belt barrier stand, then slide your panel into place. Because every kit matches our standard posts and accessories, assembly takes only a few minutes. As a result, you can set up and adjust layouts easily during busy events.

How Many Bundles to Order

Planning quantities is straightforward. Take the number of panels you intend to install and add one extra post and collar bundle. For example, ten panels will require eleven barricade post kit bundles. This ensures every panel is fully supported, including the final end section, for a neat and stable finish.

Durable, Compatible, and Flexible

Built from durable materials, each post in the barricade post kit bundle handles frequent use and movement. The retractable belt extends smoothly and locks securely, while the collars hold panels firmly in place. Furthermore, the bundle works seamlessly with our entire range of belt barriers, panels, and signage accessories. In addition, the integrated belt system allows you to attach to adjacent posts or walls using our wall receiver clips.

Why Choose Our Barricade Post Kit Bundle?
  • Quick, tool-free setup for any venue or event.
  • Includes retractable belt barrier stand and collar set.
  • Compatible with standard panel and banner systems.
  • Durable black steel finish for professional appearance.
  • Ideal for extending or completing panel runs.

Overall, the Barricade Post And Collar Bundle provides a dependable and adaptable crowd-control solution. It’s the smart choice for managing queue layouts, defining spaces, and achieving a polished, cohesive look throughout your venue.

For additional layout and crowd-management guidance, review official safety tips on the HSE website.

products.title: Belt Barrier 8 Pack - Black Post Retractable Belt Barriers - 2.6m/3.4m/3.9m Belt
products.description:
8 Belt Barrier Pack give you a reliable, budget-friendly way to guide crowds and manage queues. Each set includes QueueMaster posts with long belts, strong bases, and user-friendly features.

QueueMaster 8 Belt Barrier Pack Overview

The QueueMaster system balances quality with value. Longer belts mean fewer posts and faster setups, helping you cut costs without losing safety or style.

Why Choose These Black Queue Barriers?
  • Longest belts in class: available up to 3.9m, reducing the number of posts needed.
  • Slow-retract brake: prevents belts snapping back suddenly, lowering accident risk.
  • Locking belt end: keeps belts secure and stable during use.
  • Floor protection: full-circle rubber base ring guards against scratches and moisture.
  • Heavy yet balanced base: galvanized, concrete-filled steel stops posts from tipping.
  • Four-way connections: set up straight lines, angles, or intersections with ease.
  • Portable weight: around 9 kg per post for quick movement and layout changes.
Save Time with Retractable Queue Barriers

Install fewer posts, cover more ground, and complete layouts faster. This six-pack of retractable belt posts gives you efficient, flexible control of queues in busy venues.

Custom Belt Options

Pick from 50 stock belt colours and safety messages, or request digital printing with logos or branding. Contact us for a tailored quote.

Typical Uses

Perfect for airports, retail spaces, event halls, stadiums, and transport hubs. The robust design suits both indoor and covered outdoor settings.

Specifications
  • Pack size: 8 posts with retractable belts
  • Belt length: 2.6m to 3.9m (model dependent)
  • Post and base: steel post, concrete-filled galvanized base
  • Features: slow-retract brake, locking belt end, 4-way connectivity
  • Floor protection: full-circumference rubber ring
  • Approx. weight per post: 9kg
Compliance and Safety

Plan queue layouts responsibly and follow national guidance. See official UK HSE crowd management notes here.

Related Products

  • More Belt Barrier Posts
Summary: Black Queue Barriers for Crowd Control

This 8-pack of black queue barriers provides long belts, stable posts, and smart safety features. Choose QueueMaster for dependable and cost-effective crowd management.

products.title: Retractable Belt Barrier Magnetic Wall Mounted - 16m/23m Magnetic
products.description:
– WallPro 750 Long Belt Magnetic Barrier

The WallPro 750 Long Belt Magnetic Barrier delivers exceptional reach and control for wide or high-traffic spaces where standard barriers fall short. Designed to extend up to 23 metres, this powerful wall-mounted unit provides reliable access management without occupying valuable floor space. As a result, it’s a smart, space-saving solution for warehouses, logistics hubs, and industrial environments that demand clear, durable, and visible safety zones.

This Long Belt Magnetic Barrier Is Built for Demanding Environments

Because performance and safety matter most in busy workplaces, this professional retractable belt barrier features a tough ABS housing that resists impact, scuffs, and scratches. Its reinforced steel mounting plate keeps the unit stable during constant use. Since it mounts directly to a wall or post, it eliminates trip hazards and keeps walkways clear. Furthermore, the slow-retracting brake system ensures smooth belt movement and reduces the risk of injury, even during frequent operation.

Flexible Belt End Options

To suit different setups, three belt end fittings are available. The locking end allows secure, semi-permanent attachment; the S-clip end connects easily to standard stanchions; and the magnetic end enables quick, tool-free fastening to any metal surface. Each style provides firm hold and quick release when needed. In addition, the enclosed cassette design shields the belt from dust and debris, ensuring lasting reliability even in harsh or dusty environments.

Perfect for Industrial and Commercial Applications

The WallPro 750 suits warehouses, factories, airports, and maintenance areas. It helps close aisles, mark restricted zones, and control vehicle or forklift bays effectively. Because its long belt spans up to 23 metres, fewer units are needed—saving both setup time and maintenance effort. Moreover, it maintains a clean, professional appearance that supports site safety and organisation.

Need a version without magnets? View it here.
For official safety guidance, visit the HSE website.

products.title: Crowd Control 24 Post Horizontal Stanchion Storage Cart Trolley with Padded Slots and Accessory Tray for Venues Arenas Airports
products.description: Effortlessly Transport and Protect Your Stanchions with the High-Capacity 24 Post Horizontal Storage Cart. Revolutionize your event setup and teardown process with this exceptionally designed 24 Post Horizontal Storage Cart, engineered by Crowd Control for unparalleled efficiency and stanchion protection. This robust cart offers superior storage for up to 24 stanchions, accommodating post diameters of 50 mm, 64 mm, and 76 mm, ensuring broad compatibility with most standard stanchion systems. Say goodbye to the hassle of multiple trips, as this model provides three more storage spaces than its 21-post counterpart, significantly reducing labor time and improving operational flow. The thoughtful design features padded horizontal slots that cradle each stanchion, preventing scuffs, scratches, and other damage to their finishes, thus preserving your investment and maintaining a professional appearance. Beyond protection, the cart’s structure minimizes trip hazards, creating a safer working environment during busy setups and breakdowns. The sturdy frame is mounted on heavy-duty castors, two of which are lockable, providing excellent stability during loading and unloading, and effortless maneuverability across various floor surfaces. Maneuvering this cart through crowded areas, standard doorways, and tight service corridors is a breeze thanks to its intelligent design, which keeps its footprint compact at approximately 0.8 meters wide and 1.1 meters deep, with an approximate height of 2.2 meters. For added peace of mind and safeguarding your venue, the cart is equipped with integrated rubber corner bumpers that shield walls and doorways from accidental impacts. Streamline your workflow further with the convenient, built-in accessory tray, designed to keep belts ropes and essential tools organized and readily accessible, eliminating clutter and saving precious setup time. The cart is delivered fully assembled with castors and the accessory tray installed, accompanied by a user guide for optimal loading and care. This advanced storage solution, weighing approximately 79.5 kg, is ideal for a wide range of applications, including busy venues, large arenas, bustling airports, and professional rental fleets, offering a durable and efficient way to manage your crowd control infrastructure. Please note that this cart is not suitable for stanchions with dome bases or triple-belt posts, and may not be compatible with all WeatherMaster bases, so confirm compatibility with your specific post type.

products.title: Clamp Mounted Twin Belt Retractable Barrier - WallMaster 400 Twin Clamp Mount - 3.9m/4.6m Belt
products.description: Product OverviewThe WallMaster Twin is a wall-mounted retractable belt barrier with a unique twin-belt design. Two belts enhance visibility and prevent pedestrians from ducking underneath. Its single-piece construction is more cost-effective and easier to install than two individual wall mounts. This model offers 50mm wide belts in 3.9m or 4.6m lengths, perfect for medium-span applications like closing off warehouse aisles.The Clamp Mount WallMaster Twin comes with two fitted hose clamps, allowing it to mount to uprights such as warehouse racking, columns, or pillars. Choose from three standard clamp sizes or request a custom size. The belt includes an S-clip end to wrap around objects and secure back to the belt. Alternatively, standard or magnetic belt ends are available upon request during the ordering process.WallMaster provides high-quality, affordable wall-mounted barriers for restricting access to corridors and aisles. Its durable steel housing is available in two stock finishes. Belts feature a slow-retracting brake system, locking belt ends, and over 30 colour and safety message options. Fully customizable, belts can display any colours or messages. The WallMaster range also offers a variety of permanent and temporary mounting systems to meet diverse requirements.

products.description: This Display Bowl Sign Holder is to be used with the Display Bowl to advertise price. Items merchandised in the queue typically see a 20%+ uplift in sales because customers are idle while waiting on line allowing them time to browse. Customers don’t have this time once they reach the check out. This is a simple and low cost method of turning queue stanchions into effective merchandising fixtures. The 1.8m Solid Wall Panel and Acrylic Insert offers a smart, professional way to manage queues and define spaces. This universal panel fits most retractable belt and rope barrier systems, allowing you to enhance your setup without replacing existing posts.

The panel frame is built from high-quality aluminium to combine strength with a lightweight structure. This makes it easy to move while still providing stability once in place.

Additionally, the frame resists corrosion, ensuring long-term performance in outdoor seating areas, hotel terraces, airports, and event spaces.

Enhance Branding and Communication

This 1.8m Crowd Control Panel and Acrylic Insert transforms your queue system into a messaging platform. You can insert safety notices, promotional messages, or café branding between the acrylic panels.

Because the process is tool-free, you can update your messaging in minutes to suit changing events or seasonal promotions.

Universal Compatibility

This panel is designed to be compatible with most leading stanchion brands using an optional collar attachment system. As a result, you can add it to your current layout without investing in new posts.

The universal design ensures quick installation and provides flexibility when adjusting crowd control arrangements.

This Solid Wall Barricade Panel Improves Safety and Flow Management

Unlike belts alone, solid panels create a clear physical barrier. They prevent accidental access to restricted zones and help maintain orderly movement throughout high-traffic areas.

Furthermore, they guide customers more effectively and present a cohesive, professional image across your venue.

Ideal for Multiple Applications

This versatile barrier panel is suitable for cafés, airports, shopping centres, hospitality venues, museums, and event locations. It helps define outdoor seating areas, manage queues, increase privacy, and create branded promotional zones with ease.

Because it is modular, you can scale your system as your needs grow, making it a future-proof investment.

  • Universal fit for most barrier posts

  • Enhances safety, privacy, and venue appearance

products.description:
Product Overview: 10 Pack Belt Barriers

10 pack belt barriers from QueueMaster give you a cost-effective, professional queue system. You cut post counts, speed setup, and improve customer flow in busy areas.

Longer Belts, Lower Costs

Each post includes a choice of 2.6m through to 3.9m retractable belt options, so you span more distance with fewer units. That reduces purchase costs and installation time while keeping lines tidy.

Key Features of Queue Barriers

A slow-retract brake helps prevent snap-back. The locking belt end keeps the tape secure during use. A full-circumference rubber floor protector shields surfaces from scratches and moisture.

Fast Setup and Daily Handling

Each steel post weighs around 9 kg. Staff can move and position units quickly. The concrete-filled, galvanised base delivers reliable stability in high-traffic zones.

Flexible Layouts for Belt Barrier Posts

Four-way connectivity supports straight runs, zig-zags, and compact holding pens. Adjust lanes as traffic changes through the day.

Branding and Belt Options

Choose from 50 stock belt colours and safety messages. Custom printing lets you add logos or wayfinding so the system matches your brand.

What’s Included

Ten retractable belt posts with 2.6m through to 3.9m belt options and heavy-duty bases. Add sign frames or wall receivers to complete the setup.

Ideal Locations

Airports, arenas, transport hubs, museums, and retail stores benefit from these retractable belt barriers. The robust build suits indoor use and covered outdoor areas.

Plan Your Queue System

Pair posts with sign frames and accessories for clear guidance. Browse all belt barriers to finish your layout.

For official guidance on safe queuing, see the UK HSE’s event safety advice at hse.gov.uk/event-safety/.

These 10 pack belt barriers deliver reach, safety, and value in one proven solution. Control foot traffic with fewer posts and a cleaner line design.

products.title: QueuePro Replacement Belt Cassette for 75mm Posts - Retractable Barrier Mechanism with 4.9m Belt for Crowd Control & Safety Systems
products.description: QueuePro Replacement Cassette 4.9m Belt for 75mm Stanchions Effortlessly refresh your safety belt barriers with the QueuePro Replacement Cassette featuring a 4.9-meter belt. This all-in-one unit combines the essential retraction mechanism, a durable belt, and a secure belt end, designed for swift and simple replacement of your existing cassettes. Say goodbye to complicated installations; swapping out old for new is as easy as loosening the four bottom screws of your stanchion, sliding out the depleted cassette, and inserting the fresh QueuePro unit. Then, simply retighten the four bottom screws, being careful not to over-tighten as this could compromise the smooth belt retraction, and absolutely avoid touching the top screws. This user-friendly design ensures minimal downtime and keeps your queuing areas functioning optimally. The QueuePro cassette is specifically engineered to retrofit standard 75mm wide posts, offering a seamless integration with your current stanchion setup. Its robust construction guarantees longevity, making it a cost-effective solution for maintaining your crowd control infrastructure. Available in a classic black belt that complements most decors, this cassette is ideal for high-traffic environments such as retail stores, airports, banks, and event venues where efficient queuing management is paramount. For an added touch of professionalism and brand reinforcement, custom belt printing is also available, allowing you to refresh your existing posts with your unique branding on the webbing, creating a cohesive and memorable customer experience. This ensures that your brand identity is consistently present, even within your operational safety equipment, enhancing overall brand visibility and customer perception. The 4.9-meter belt length provides ample reach, offering flexibility in directing queues and managing customer flow across a variety of spatial configurations. The retraction mechanism is engineered for smooth and controlled belt deployment and retraction, preventing accidental entanglement and maintaining a tidy appearance. This focus on operational efficiency and aesthetic appeal makes the QueuePro Replacement Cassette an indispensable component for any organization committed to superior crowd management and a polished operational image. Its easy installation and robust build make it a reliable choice for busy retail environments where every detail contributes to the customer journey and operational effectiveness.

products.title: WallMaster450 - Yellow Wall Mounted Retractable Belt Barrier - 6.1m to 10.6m Belt.
products.description:
10.6m Belt Wall Barrier – Long-Reach Retractable Access Control

The 10.6m Belt Wall Barrier is a long-reach, wall-mounted retractable belt system that manages access and improves safety in busy spaces. Because it mounts directly to the wall, it saves valuable floor space while still providing clear, visible separation. In addition, the extended 10.6 m belt span reduces the number of endpoints required, helping you install barriers faster and keep walkways organised.

Why choose the 10.6m Belt Wall Barrier?
  • Space-saving wall mount keeps floors clear and hazard-free.
  • Long-reach belt reduces the need for extra posts or stanchions.
  • Slow-retract brake allows smooth and safe belt return every time.
  • Locking belt end prevents accidental release for better control.
  • Durable cassette design withstands daily use in high-traffic zones.
Best uses and layout ideas for your 10.6m Belt Wall Barrier

You can close warehouse aisles during picking, mark restricted areas during maintenance, or divide zones for cleaning. Furthermore, this barrier helps guide pedestrians at airports, venues, and retail back-of-house areas. Since it stays fixed to the wall, it also fits tight corridors where floor posts would obstruct movement. Altogether, the 10.6 m Belt Wall Barrier brings flexibility and order to almost any layout.

Installation and compatibility

Mount the unit securely to walls, posts, or racking using the proper bracket. Then connect it to belt receivers and endpoints for a clean, professional finish. Because the enclosed cassette protects the webbing from dust and impact, the mechanism lasts longer and performs reliably. Consequently, you enjoy consistent operation and reduced maintenance across multiple locations.

Visibility, messages, and branding options

Choose bright colours or hazard stripes to attract attention and increase safety. Moreover, you can add printed safety messages for instant recognition. If you prefer a professional, branded appearance, request custom belts printed with your company logo or site instructions. This extra visual touch strengthens your brand identity while promoting clear communication.

Safety guidance for 10.6 m Belt Wall Barrier installations

Always plan pedestrian routes and crossing points carefully so movement remains safe and efficient. For additional advice, follow the UK HSE’s official crowd-management guidance  here.

Related 10.6m Belt Wall Barrier products

  • Safety-Colour Units
Specifications
  • Type: wall-mounted retractable belt cassette
  • Belt length: 10.6m long-reach design for fewer endpoints
  • Mechanism: slow-retract brake and locking belt end
  • Mounting: wall, post, or racking with compatible bracket
  • Applications: warehouses, airports, venues, and retail facilities
Summary

The 10.6m Belt Wall Barrier combines compact installation, smooth operation, and strong materials for dependable crowd control. Because it spans long distances and installs easily, it delivers excellent value for facilities that require clear, safe movement paths. Choose this model to simplify access management, improve workflow, and maintain a professional look throughout your site.

products.title: 1.2m Black Aluminium Panel
products.description:
– 1.2m Solid Wall Barricade Panel and Acrylic Insert

The 1.2m Solid Wall Barricade Panel and Acrylic Insert offers a smart, professional way to manage queues and define spaces. This universal panel fits most retractable belt and rope barrier systems, allowing you to enhance your setup without replacing existing posts.

It delivers a clean, modern appearance while improving safety, customer flow, and brand presentation. Whether you are managing queues or simply defining boundaries, this panel provides an elegant, functional solution.

Clear and Frosted Acrylic Options

You can choose between clear acrylic and frosted acrylic inserts. The clear insert is ideal for branded messaging, directional signs, or advertising displays. It also supports custom graphics placed between dual acrylic sheets.

Meanwhile, the frosted option provides subtle privacy while still allowing light through. Both styles are durable, UV-resistant, and suitable for indoor or outdoor use.

Lightweight and Weather Resistant Design

The panel frame is built from high-quality aluminium to combine strength with a lightweight structure. This makes it easy to move while still providing stability once in place.

Additionally, the frame resists corrosion, ensuring long-term performance in outdoor seating areas, hotel terraces, airports, and event spaces.

Enhance Branding and Communication

This 1.2m Crowd Control Panel and Acrylic Insert transforms your queue system into a messaging platform. You can insert safety notices, promotional messages, or café branding between the acrylic panels.

Because the process is tool-free, you can update your messaging in minutes to suit changing events or seasonal promotions.

Universal Compatibility

This panel is designed to be compatible with most leading stanchion brands using an optional collar attachment system. As a result, you can add it to your current layout without investing in new posts.

The universal design ensures quick installation and provides flexibility when adjusting crowd control arrangements.

This Solid Wall Barricade Panel Improves Safety and Flow Management

Unlike belts alone, solid panels create a clear physical barrier. They prevent accidental access to restricted zones and help maintain orderly movement throughout high-traffic areas.

Furthermore, they guide customers more effectively and present a cohesive, professional image across your venue.

Ideal for Multiple Applications

This versatile barrier panel is suitable for cafés, airports, shopping centres, hospitality venues, museums, and event locations. It helps define outdoor seating areas, manage queues, increase privacy, and create branded promotional zones with ease.

Because it is modular, you can scale your system as your needs grow, making it a future-proof investment.

Key Benefits of the Solid Wall Barricade Panel
  • Universal fit for most barrier posts
  • Clear or frosted acrylic insert options
  • Supports custom messaging and logos
  • Durable aluminium frame for long-term use
  • Enhances safety, privacy, and venue appearance
  • Lightweight and easy to reconfigure
Upgrade Your Barrier System

Choose the 1.2m Crowd Control Panel and Acrylic Insert to enhance your crowd control layout with a durable, attractive, and highly functional solution. It delivers professional results while offering quick installation and universal compatibility.

Explore Related Products

To view all compatible options, visit our Panels & Banners Collection. For general safety planning tips, see official UK guidance on the HSE website.

Built for Long-Term Performance

Moreover, the wheels lock firmly in place during use, preventing unintentional shifting. Consequently, the barricade stays stable even in busy or uneven environments.

Perfect for construction sites, warehouses, airports, shopping centres, and public facilities, the FlexPro Expanding Barricades deliver reliable hazard protection and efficient crowd control. Their collapsible design saves storage space, while their strong build ensures long-term value.

It helps define entrances and exits while clearly marking restricted areas without obstructing walkways. Additionally, its bold red finish stands out in busy environments, guiding foot traffic even from a distance. Because the steel frame resists impact and weather exposure, it performs equally well indoors and outdoors.Setup, linking, and storage tipsSetting up the Red Steel Crowd Barricade is quick and straightforward. First, attach the feet, then place the initial panel in position. After that, link additional units together until you reach the required length. Retractable belt barrier features
  • Compact ABS housing with secure wall plate.

Long belt wall barrier applications

Guide staff and visitors through corridors and bays. Mark cleaning zones and block unsafe areas. Control loading docks, stock aisles, and maintenance zones. Printed belts deliver clear messages at a distance. High-visibility patterns improve hazard awareness.

Compatibility and options

Installation

Quick and Easy Setup

You’ll find detailed steps in our blog post and downloadable assembly sheet, both designed to guide you through the installation with confidence.

Clear and Frosted Panel Options

Choose between two attractive acrylic styles — clear acrylic and frosted acrylic. Both offer strength, clarity, and durability, but the clear panels work best when you want to display custom graphics. Simply insert your printed design between the supplied dual 3mm clear acrylic sheets and slide them into the frame during assembly. This quick process turns your barricade into an eye-catching branded display while still maintaining safe, defined spaces.

Durable Aluminium Frame for Outdoor Use

We build each panel frame from high-quality aluminium for strength and corrosion resistance. The lightweight frame moves easily when you need to change layouts, yet its tough finish stands up to regular use. Because of this durability, the Post and Panel Barricade performs reliably in both indoor and outdoor environments. Its combination of strength, simplicity, and style makes it ideal for busy venues that require long-term performance.

The Post and Panel Barricade is Trusted by Leading Institutions

Schools, universities, and event organisers rely on this Post and Panel Barricade for dependable crowd guidance. Its smart, uniform design suits high-traffic environments such as arenas, hospitality areas, and exhibitions, ensuring safe flow and a consistent professional image.

The FlexGate Flexible Expanding Gate Barricade delivers fast, flexible, and efficient access control for both indoor and outdoor environments. Because it deploys and retracts smoothly, the FlexGate is ideal for use in warehouses, retail areas, construction sites, and public facilities where space and time matter.

Quick, Expandable Design

The FlexGate Flexible Expanding Gate Barricade opens effortlessly to create a secure temporary closure. Simply unlock, expand, and position the barrier to block access. When the area is clear, collapse it back into a compact unit for storage or transport. As a result, you can manage changing conditions quickly without permanent fixtures or heavy lifting.

OurFlexible Expanding Gate Barricade is Lightweight, Strong, and Easy to Handle

Engineered from durable materials, the FlexGate combines light weight with solid construction. Its smooth-glide mechanism ensures quiet, stable operation while the robust frame stands up to daily use. Furthermore, the ergonomic design makes repositioning straightforward, even for a single operator. Therefore, it’s a dependable choice for fast-moving work environments.

Compact Portability and Minimal Storage

products.title: Floor Socket For Use With Removable Barrier Posts.
products.description:
– floor mounted barrier socket

The floor mounted barrier socket secures queue posts while keeping floors clear. It suits airports, arenas, and busy retail entrances. Remove posts in seconds for cleaning, events, or deliveries. The satin stainless sleeve includes a flush cap for a neat finish when not in use.

Floor mounted barrier socket benefits
  • Create a fixed queue layout without bulky bases.
  • Lift posts out quickly when the route must change.
  • Flush cap reduces trip risks and blocks debris.
  • Stainless construction handles high foot traffic.
  • Clean look that complements premium interiors.
Compatibility

Works with most belt or rope barrier posts fitted with a male floor-socket adaptor. This socket supports straight runs, corners, and returns when paired with matching receivers.

Typical applications
  • Airports, stadiums, museums, and visitor attractions
  • Supermarkets, department stores, and ticket halls
  • Corporate lobbies and event venues
  • Back-of-house lines where floor space is tight
Installation (summary)
  1. Core-drill the slab to the required depth and diameter.
  2. Set the socket perfectly vertical using resin or grout.
  3. Allow to cure, then fit the cap flush with the floor.
  4. Attach the male adaptor to your post and insert to use.

For wet zones, ask your installer about sealing or drainage. Professional installation is recommended for structural floors.

What’s included
  • Satin stainless floor socket
  • Flush cap
  • Basic installation guide
Specifications Internal diameter 50 mm Depth 120 mm Finish Satin stainless steel Post interface Requires compatible male floor-socket adaptor Recommended use Outdoor; Concrete: Indoor; sealed floors (tile, stone, concrete) FAQs

Can I mix fixed and removable posts?
Yes. Use the floor mounted barrier socket where removal is needed and standard bases elsewhere.

Will my posts fit?
Using our adaptor 64mm posts will fit and allow them to be attached to the floor socket.

Note: Always confirm adaptor compatibility with your exact barrier model. Use trained installers for core drilling.

Have a look at the type of posts you can use with this socket: Socket Posts Guidance from HSE on pedestrian control: Pedestrian flow

Product Overview: 30m Retractable Hose Reel

Upgrade your watering routine with this grey, wall-mounted reel. It keeps your garden neat and organised while delivering smooth, reliable watering. Enjoy fast setup, easy use, and tidy storage after every job.

Advanced Retractable Mechanism

Pull to the length you need, then give a gentle tug to rewind. The layering guide feeds the hose side to side to minimise kinks. This saves time, reduces wear, and extends hose life.

What’s in the Box and Installation

You receive the reel, bracket, fixing pack, and quick-start guide. Mark four holes, drill, and secure the bracket. Hang the reel, connect the inlet hose, and turn on the tap. Most users complete setup in minutes with basic tools.

Sizes, Colours, and Use Cases

Choose 15m, 20m, or 30m reach to suit your plot. Colours include Grey, Black, White, and Green. Water borders, rinse cars, clean furniture, and refresh lawns with one compact solution.

Care and Warranty

Rinse dirt from the hose before rewind. Store the reel out of standing water. Check fixings each season. These simple steps help maintain smooth operation year after year.

Key Features of the 30m Retractable Hose Reel
  • ✅ 30m reach for flexible garden coverage
  • ✅ Smooth automatic rewind with kink-reduction guide
  • ✅ Space-saving wall bracket and tidy storage
  • ✅ Weather-resistant housing for long service life
  • ✅ Available in Grey, Black, White, and Green
  • ✅ Also available in 15m and 20m sizes
Why Choose the 30m Retractable Hose Reel?

The 30m Retractable Hose Reel combines reach, durability, and ease. It reduces mess, saves time, and keeps outdoor areas uncluttered. That’s better for gardens of all sizes.

Rinse dirt from the hose before rewind. Store the reel out of standing water. Check fixings each season. These simple steps help maintain smooth operation year after year.

This all-in-one, quick-change unit simplifies the process of refreshing your stanchion setup, allowing for minimal downtime and maximum efficiency. Replacing your old cassette is remarkably straightforward. Simply use a screwdriver to loosen the four bottom screws on the stanchion post, being careful not to disturb the top screws. Once loosened, you can carefully slide out the old cassette, ensuring not to cause any damage to the post itself. The new QueuePro Replacement Cassette is designed for easy insertion; simply align it correctly and slide it into the stanchion until it sits securely. To finish, gently tighten the four bottom screws until they are snug, taking care not to overtighten, which could potentially impede the belt's smooth retraction. This versatile cassette boasts a design that fits standard 64mm wide posts, making it compatible with a wide range of stanchions currently in use, thus offering a cost-effective solution for modernization. The belt length is adjustable, offering flexibility to adapt to various spatial needs, ranging from a concise 2.3 meters up to an extended 3.9 meters, providing ample coverage for different queuing configurations and crowd densities. This ensures that your stanchions can be adapted to a variety of situations without the need for multiple types of barrier systems, making it a truly versatile solution. The robust construction and thoughtful design underscore the reliability and ease of use that customers expect from a leading retail organization dedicated to providing superior operational tools.

products.title: 1.8m Yellow Steel Barricade - Sturdy & Durable Metal Crowd Control Barrier for Safety & Events
products.description:
Yellow Steel Crowd Barricade – 1.8 m Compact ModelThe Yellow Steel Crowd Barricade combines high visibility with a tough welded frame for fast, reliable crowd control. At 1.8 m long with removable feet, it stores flat, moves easily, and links quickly to form straight runs or gentle angles. Moreover, its compact form allows it to fit comfortably in tight areas where full-sized barriers may be impractical. Because of that, it’s ideal for smaller venues, pop-up markets, and temporary access points that require quick, efficient setup.Key features of this Yellow Steel Crowd Barricade
  • Compact length (1.8 m): perfect for restricted spaces and quick layouts.
  • Durable construction: welded steel frame with a long-lasting purple finish for added visibility.
  • Removable feet: detach easily for flat stacking and safe transport.
  • Hook-and-loop ends: connect panels securely with consistent alignment.
  • Smooth top rail: improves safety for both crowds and staff.
Where this Yellow Steel Crowd Barricade works bestYou can use this red crowd control barricade at festivals, stadiums, retail queues, schools, construction sites, and transport hubs. It helps define entrances and exits while clearly marking restricted areas without obstructing walkways. Additionally, its bold red finish stands out in busy environments, guiding foot traffic even from a distance. Because the steel frame resists impact and weather exposure, it performs equally well indoors and outdoors.Setup, linking, and storage tipsSetting up the Yellow Steel Crowd Barricade is quick and straightforward. First, attach the feet, then place the initial panel in position. After that, link additional units together until you reach the required length. Each hook-and-loop connection provides stability and smooth alignment. For longer moves, stack panels flat on a trolley to reduce handling time. When dismantling, the removable feet make disassembly faster and easier. Furthermore, by labelling stacks by colour, teams can deploy specific barrier zones quickly at multi-area events.Safety and planningEffective crowd management always starts with planning. Therefore, assess routes, crowd capacity, and emergency access before each event. In addition, ensure all barricades are placed to maintain safe spacing and clear visibility. Follow official UK guidance on crowd management from the HSEhere. With careful preparation, you’ll create safer and more efficient spaces for both visitors and staff.Related products
  • All metal barricades
  • Barricade Storage Option
  • Safety Guidance
Specifications
  • Length: 1.8 m (compact)
  • Frame: welded steel
  • Finish: yellow, high-visibility
  • Feet: removable, stack-friendly
  • Connections: hook-and-loop ends
  • Use: indoor and outdoor (as conditions allow)
SummaryOverall, the Yellow Steel Crowd Barricade provides durable crowd control, fast layouts, and excellent visibility for events and public spaces. Because it’s lightweight yet strong, crews can move and position each section quickly. As a result, setup times shorten and layouts remain consistent. For organisers seeking a compact, professional, and easy-to-manage solution, this barricade offers the perfect balance between safety, efficiency, and design appeal.

products.title: Outdoor Retractable Belt Barrier - WeatherMaster 250 Black- 2 pack bundle 2.6m/3.4m/3.9m Belt
products.description:
– WeatherMaster Outdoor Retractable Barriers

The WeatherMaster Outdoor Weatherproof Belt Barrier combines rugged performance with dependable safety. It’s designed for outdoor conditions where reliability and visibility are essential. From construction sites and car parks to factories and event areas, it provides consistent crowd control and access management. Each barrier withstands wind, rain, and heavy use, keeping your site organised in all seasons.

Heavy-Duty Design and Reliable Safety

Every WeatherMaster barrier features a robust rubber base that stays stable even on rough ground. The curved profile reduces trip hazards and allows vehicles to roll over safely. Built-in handles make it easy to lift and reposition whenever layouts change. Because setup is quick, it suits environments where crowd routes shift throughout the day.

The locking belt end keeps the belt firmly connected until you choose to release it. Its slow-retracting brake system manages belt speed smoothly, preventing sudden snapback and protecting users. These safety-focused features reduce maintenance and extend service life.

Customisation and Visibility for Every Application

Choose from three bright post colours that stand out in high-traffic areas. Over 40 belt designs are available, displaying messages such as “Do Not Enter,” “Caution,” or custom branding. Belt lengths from 2.6m to 3.9m provide flexible coverage, reducing the number of posts needed for large setups. You can also order bespoke colours to align with your company branding or site safety scheme.

The WeatherMaster Outdoor Weatherproof Belt Barrier is Built for Long-Term Outdoor Use

Unlike indoor barriers, WeatherMaster Outdoor Retractable Barriers use UV-resistant, weatherproof materials that resist fading and corrosion. Their precision mechanisms deliver smooth retraction in hot, wet, or cold conditions. Trusted globally in logistics hubs, airports, and industrial sites, they deliver consistent performance day after day.

In summary, the WeatherMaster Outdoor Weatherproof Belt Barrier provides superior strength, high visibility, and professional crowd control. It’s a proven choice for anyone needing outdoor queue management built to last.

Why Choose the SafetyPro Extra-Long Removable Belt Barrier?

The SafetyPro Extra-Long Removable Belt Barrier delivers the perfect balance of strength, flexibility, and visibility. It’s a proven solution for facilities that require secure, high-impact barriers with the freedom to reconfigure layouts quickly.

products.title: Heavy Duty Vertical Sign Frame with 19mm Border for Rope Stanchions - Easy Sign Replacement & Outdoor Use - Choose Your Size
products.description: The Ultimate Vertical Heavy Duty Sign Frame for Rope Stanchions Secure Your Message in Style and Durability Introducing the ultimate solution for clear, prominent signage in any environment The Vertical Heavy Duty Sign Frame designed specifically to attach seamlessly to your rope stanchions is engineered for exceptional durability and ease of use. This frame boasts a substantial 19mm border, providing a robust and professional presentation for your important messages, making it perfectly suited for even the busiest high-traffic zones. Its versatile design offers a choice between two convenient sizes ensuring you can find the perfect fit for your specific needs and display space. The clever top-opening mechanism allows for incredibly simple sign insertion and replacement. No more struggling with complicated installations This intuitive design lets you effortlessly slide your signs in and out, saving you valuable time and effort. You have the flexibility to use 6mm thick sign material directly within the frame, or opt for the convenience of our frames supplied with two sheets of clear protective acrylic, perfect for showcasing your signs behind a crystal-clear barrier. Please note that signs are sold separately. To securely attach this heavy-duty frame to your stanchions, tapping is required. This process creates a reliable screw thread in the stanchion top, ensuring a sturdy connection for any sign frame from our extensive range. It is important to note that only stanchions with crown or flat tops can be tapped for this purpose; stanchions with ball tops are not compatible. We understand that compatibility is key, which is why we offer a variety of studs to ensure a perfect fit with all major stanchion brands. Furthermore, for those requiring signage solutions beyond indoor applications, this Heavy Duty Sign Frame can be weatherized to withstand the elements, making it a dependable choice for outdoor use as well, protecting your important information from rain and sun. The product is visually represented by an image showing a sturdy, rectangular sign holder designed to be mounted on top of a post stanchion. The frame itself is black with a significant border, likely the 19mm mentioned, giving it a substantial and professional appearance. The sign area within the frame appears to be vertical, confirming the product's name. The material looks like durable plastic or metal, built to withstand frequent handling and the rigors of a busy environment. The top edge of the frame shows a clear opening, consistent with the description of an easy-slide in feature for sign insertion. The design prioritizes functionality and robustness, aiming to provide a secure and easily updatable display solution.

products.title: 1.2m Satin Aluminum Panel With Acrylic Insert
products.description:
– 1.2m Solid Post Panel Frames and Acrylic Insert

The 1.2m Solid Post Panel Frames and Acrylic Insert offers a smart, professional way to manage queues and define spaces. This universal panel fits most retractable belt and rope barrier systems, allowing you to enhance your setup without replacing existing posts.

It delivers a clean, modern appearance while improving safety, customer flow, and brand presentation. Whether you are managing queues or simply defining boundaries, this panel provides an elegant, functional solution.

Clear and Frosted Acrylic Options

You can choose between clear acrylic and frosted acrylic inserts. The clear insert is ideal for branded messaging, directional signs, or advertising displays. It also supports custom graphics placed between dual acrylic sheets.

Meanwhile, the frosted option provides subtle privacy while still allowing light through. Both styles are durable, UV-resistant, and suitable for indoor or outdoor use.

Lightweight and Weather Resistant Design

The panel frame is built from high-quality aluminium to combine strength with a lightweight structure. This makes it easy to move while still providing stability once in place.

Additionally, the frame resists corrosion, ensuring long-term performance in outdoor seating areas, hotel terraces, airports, and event spaces.

Enhance Branding and Communication

This 1.2m Crowd Control Panel and Acrylic Insert transforms your queue system into a messaging platform. You can insert safety notices, promotional messages, or café branding between the acrylic panels.

Because the process is tool-free, you can update your messaging in minutes to suit changing events or seasonal promotions.

Universal Compatibility

This panel is designed to be compatible with most leading stanchion brands using an optional collar attachment system. As a result, you can add it to your current layout without investing in new posts.

The universal design ensures quick installation and provides flexibility when adjusting crowd control arrangements.

Improved Safety and Flow Management

Unlike belts alone, solid panels create a clear physical barrier. They prevent accidental access to restricted zones and help maintain orderly movement throughout high-traffic areas.

Furthermore, they guide customers more effectively and present a cohesive, professional image across your venue.

These Solid Post Panel Frames are Ideal for Multiple Applications

This versatile barrier panel is suitable for cafés, airports, shopping centres, hospitality venues, museums, and event locations. It helps define outdoor seating areas, manage queues, increase privacy, and create branded promotional zones with ease.

Because it is modular, you can scale your system as your needs grow, making it a future-proof investment.

Key Benefits
  • Universal fit for most barrier posts
  • Clear or frosted acrylic insert options
  • Supports custom messaging and logos
  • Durable aluminium frame for long-term use
  • Enhances safety, privacy, and venue appearance
  • Lightweight and easy to reconfigure
Upgrade Your Barrier System

products.title: Magnetic WallMaster450 - Yellow Wall Mounted Retractable Long Belt Barrier - 6.1m to 10.6m Belt.
products.description:
Magnetic Long Belt Barrier – Wall-Mounted Retractable Belt Barrier

The Magnetic Long Belt Barrier delivers impressive belt lengths from a compact, easy-to-install unit. It provides a fast and flexible way to manage access, close aisles, or create safe working zones without taking up valuable floor space. Because the barrier mounts magnetically, it can be repositioned in seconds, making it perfect for environments that change frequently.

Why Choose a Magnetic Long Belt Barrier?

This model offers the convenience of temporary mounting while maintaining the strength and safety features found in permanent installations. The magnetic back plate allows attachment to any metal surface, so there’s no need for drilling or wall fixings. It’s ideal for quick deployment during cleaning, maintenance, or restricted access operations.

  • Magnetic mount enables quick, tool-free setup on metal surfaces.
  • Space-saving wall design keeps aisles and floors completely clear.
  • Extra-long belts minimise the number of endpoints required.
  • Slow-retract brake ensures a controlled and safe belt return.
  • Durable cassette design stands up to heavy daily use.
Best Uses and Layout Ideas

The Magnetic Long Belt Barrier is suitable for warehouses, factories, airports, and retail back-of-house areas. Use it to close aisles during cleaning or restocking, secure loading bays, or define maintenance zones. In public venues, it helps direct pedestrian flow and separates staff-only sections. Because it moves easily, it’s a practical solution for changing layouts or temporary access control.

Installation and Compatibility

Mount this retractable belt unit onto any metal surface, post, or racking. Pair it with belt receivers and endpoints for a neat, professional finish. The enclosed cassette protects the webbing, keeping it clean and extending its service life. When not needed, simply lift the unit away—no marks, no fixings left behind.

Visibility, Messages, and Branding

Select high-visibility colours such as yellow, red, or black hazard stripes for safety-critical areas. Add printed safety messages like “Do Not Enter” or “Cleaning in Progress.” For corporate use, we can custom print your logo or site-specific text to strengthen branding and improve clarity.

Safety and Best Practice

Always plan pedestrian and vehicle routes carefully to ensure safe access. For guidance on layout and crowd management, review the official UK HSE advice here. Following these recommendations helps maintain compliance and enhances workplace safety.

  • More wall-mounted barriers
  • WallPro 750 unit – 16m/23m belt
  • WallMaster 450 in safety colours
Specifications

  • Belt length: Extended options for wider coverage
  • Mechanism: Slow-retract brake and locking belt end

  • Applications: Warehouses, airports, venues, and retail areas

The Magnetic Extended Belt Barrier combines reach, reliability, and speed of setup in one compact unit. It’s the ideal choice for sites that need flexible, safe, and professional temporary access control. Durable, easy to move, and available in many styles, this barrier keeps your operations organised and secure.

Best Uses and Layout Ideas

The Magnetic Extended Belt Barrier is suitable for warehouses, factories, airports, and retail back-of-house areas. Use it to close aisles during cleaning or restocking, secure loading bays, or define maintenance zones. In public venues, it helps direct pedestrian flow and separates staff-only sections. Because it moves easily, it’s a practical solution for changing layouts or temporary access control.

Installation and Compatibility

Mount this retractable belt unit onto any metal surface, post, or racking. Pair it with belt receivers and endpoints for a neat, professional finish. The enclosed cassette protects the webbing, keeping it clean and extending its service life. When not needed, simply lift the unit away—no marks, no fixings left behind.

Visibility, Messages, and Branding

Select high-visibility colours such as yellow, red, or black hazard stripes for safety-critical areas. Add printed safety messages like “Do Not Enter” or “Cleaning in Progress.” For corporate use, we can custom print your logo or site-specific text to strengthen branding and improve clarity.

Safety and Best Practice

Always plan pedestrian and vehicle routes carefully to ensure safe access. For guidance on layout and crowd management, review the official UK HSE advice here. Following these recommendations helps maintain compliance and enhances workplace safety.

products.title: Crowd Control Mini Floor Socket for Removable Barrier Posts - Satin Stainless Steel, Low-Profile, Flush Mount for Retail, Airports & Events
products.description: Discover the Ultimate Invisible Queue Management Solution Mini Floor Socket For Use With Removable Barrier Posts In Satin Stainless Steel Revolutionize your space management with our Mini Floor Socket, an ingenious solution designed for seamless queue management and exceptional aesthetics. This mini floor mounted socket offers a sophisticated alternative to bulky stanchion bases, ensuring your walkways remain unobstructed and your premium spaces maintain their visual appeal. The primary benefit of this innovative design is its incredibly compact body, boasting a significantly smaller footprint than traditional sockets. This discreet size means that when your barrier posts are removed and the included low-profile cap is in place, the socket becomes virtually invisible, offering a clean and unobtrusive finish that sits completely flush to the floor. This flush design not only enhances the overall look of your environment but also significantly lowers the trip risk for pedestrians, creating a safer and more accessible area. Crafted from high-quality satin stainless steel, this mini floor socket is built to withstand the demands of high-traffic environments, making it an ideal choice for a variety of demanding locations. Its robust construction ensures durability and longevity, providing a reliable queue management system for years to come. The socket's ingenious design allows for quick and easy unscrewing of barrier posts, facilitating hassle-free cleaning, efficient event setups, or unobstructed deliveries. This flexibility makes it perfect for dynamic environments where adaptability is key. To ensure compatibility with your existing stanchions, the Mini Floor Socket requires a compatible mini male floor-socket adaptor. We offer adaptors to match various post tube sizes, so it's crucial to select the adaptor that precisely matches your post's specifications. Please confirm your post tube thread or taper before making your purchase to guarantee a perfect fit. This versatile system, when paired with matching receivers, supports the creation of straight runs, corners, and complex returns, allowing you to design a queue layout that perfectly suits your unique needs. Typical applications for this sophisticated queuing system include bustling airports, dynamic stadiums, informative museums, and captivating visitor attractions. It's also an excellent solution for retail entrances, busy ticket halls, and elegant corporate lobbies. Furthermore, its space-saving design makes it invaluable for event venues and back-of-house areas where floor space is at a premium and efficiency is paramount. You can even integrate fixed and removable posts within the same layout by using these mini floor mounted barrier sockets where removal is needed, and standard bases elsewhere, offering unparalleled control over your pedestrian flow. Installation is a straightforward process, though professional installation is highly recommended for optimal results, especially for structural floors. The basic steps involve core-drilling to the required mini depth and diameter, setting the socket perfectly vertical using resin or grout, and allowing it to cure. Once cured, the flush cap is fitted level with the finished floor, and finally, the mini male adaptor is attached to your barrier post, ready for insertion. For wet zones, it is advisable to consult with your installer about appropriate sealing or drainage solutions. What's included with your purchase is the satin stainless mini floor socket itself, the essential low-profile flush cap, and a basic installation guide to assist you. The internal diameter is available in mini sizes, which you will select to match your specific post tube. It features a reduced, compact depth making it ideal for shallow slabs and retrofitting projects. The recommended use is for indoor environments with sealed floors such as tile, stone, or concrete. Experience the elegance of a virtually invisible queue management system that combines functionality, durability, and superior aesthetics.

– QueuePro 250 Magnetic Base Retractable Barrier

The QueuePro 250 Magnetic Base Retractable Barrier delivers a fixed queue solution without drilling or permanent fittings. Its innovative magnetic base holds the post firmly in position, providing a strong, stable connection that keeps your queue lines consistent. Designed for high-traffic venues, the barrier stays in place even under constant movement while allowing quick reconfiguration when needed.

Strong Magnetic Stability and Quick Release

Six powerful magnets secure the base to the floor, ensuring the stanchion resists daily knocks and vibrations. When adjustments are required, staff can easily lift and reposition the post by pulling on the top section. The 22 cm diameter steel base includes 3M VHB adhesive tape for a semi-permanent bond, offering both strength and flexibility. This practical design eliminates the need for drilling, making it ideal for retail stores, airports, event halls, and temporary queue setups.

Durable Construction and Safety Features

Built from heavy-duty steel, the QueuePro 250 Magnetic stands up to years of commercial use. It includes essential safety components such as a slow-retract brake system and a belt lock to prevent accidental release. These features help reduce hazards in busy environments while improving the overall customer experience. Additionally, the post supports an optional magnetic belt end for a complete, secure connection.

Customisable Design Options

Every QueuePro 250 Magnetic Retractable Belt Barrier can be finished to match your brand or venue aesthetic. Choose from over 200 powder coat colours or a selection of specialty finishes for a professional appearance. Because QueuePro is part of a premium barrier system, it integrates perfectly with other QueuePro models, giving you flexibility across multiple queue areas.

With its combination of durability, flexibility, and quick setup, the QueuePro 250 Magnetic offers a superior solution for maintaining orderly, safe queues—without compromising floor surfaces or layout freedom.

products.description: QueueMaster Replacement Cassette for Belt Barriers 2.3m to 3.9m Belt for 64mm Wide Posts Effortlessly upgrade your existing belt barrier stanchions with the QueueMaster Replacement Cassette. Forget complicated assembly and special tools. The QueueMaster cassette allows for incredibly fast installation; simply loosen the four screws located at the base of your current cassette, slide out the old unit, and seamlessly insert the new one. Quick and Easy Setup

Our innovative collar attachment system lets you fit panels to most retractable belt barriers using only the included Allen key. The process takes just minutes. Attach the collars to the stanchions, slide the panel into place, and tighten the fittings until secure. You’ll find detailed steps in our blog post and downloadable assembly sheet, both designed to guide you through the installation with confidence.

Clear and Frosted Panel Options

Choose between two attractive acrylic styles — clear acrylic and frosted acrylic. Both offer strength, clarity, and durability, but the clear panels work best when you want to display custom graphics. Simply insert your printed design between the supplied dual 3mm clear acrylic sheets and slide them into the frame during assembly.
